_comment: TFCU Screenshot Annotation Template v4.5 - Example annotation configurations
_instructions: Map each image stem (filename without extension) to an array of annotation objects
Position coordinates are percentages (0-100) of image dimensions
Supported types: callout, arrow, highlight, circle, label
Color options: primary, critical, warning, info, success, purple, orange
v4.5: Legend is NO LONGER placed on screenshots - callouts are referenced inline in procedure text
REQUIRED: 'description' field is mandatory - this text appears in the procedure step as '(color callout N)'
Write descriptions as action instructions: 'Click Login button' NOT 'Login button location'
RECOMMENDED: Include 'figure_title' and 'section' for proper figure indexing

image1_login_screen.description: Click the Login button to access the system

image2_account_entry.description: Account number input field - enter 10-digit account number

image3_menu_navigation.description: Select the Tools menu from the main navigation
Choose Settings from the dropdown options

image5_error_screen.description: Error message display area - read carefully before proceeding
Review the error details shown in this area
Arrow indicating flow to Retry button
Click the Retry button to attempt the operation again

_example_minimal._comment: Minimum required fields for an annotation
